msgs.text: ORGANIC Bitcoin started as an idea, then turned into a collectible (that originally had no value), and is now valued at $40,000. For most of the world, Bitcoin was a grassroots movement and revolution to protect citizens from inflation and totalitarianism. There is no marketing team or marketing budget behind bitcoin. No one earns a salary to promote bitcoin. Bitcoin's growth is 100% organic.
EMPOWERING Learning about Bitcoin is empowering. You feel a moment of euphoria when it "clicks" for you. Bitcoin knowledge makes you stronger, more intelligent, happier, and peaceful.
ELEGANT Bitcoin's code is elegantly designed. More on this later
FREEDOM CENTRIC Bitcoin is freedom money. Bitcoin is all about being self-sovereign...taking control of your property, wealth and savings and being able to have a voice.
